ISSUE.TITLE: request help: How are worker_processes configured
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Environment * apisix version (cmd: `apisix version`): 1.4 * OS: linux how can configured `worker_processes` my config.yml ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8486184/89600951-e14f0380-d895-11ea-9c16-5bd9ba958c63.png) but worker_processes is not working , in nginx.conf `worker_processes` always auto pelase help me 3q

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: bugfix: used a table array to store the `status`, allow the plugin can (#1994) be called multiple times. fix #1986

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: allow customizing worker_processes (#2017) * feat: allow customizing worker_processes Close #2016
